abstract: Never mind all that talk of “fat cat bankers.” President Obama will head to New York on March 1 to raise campaign cash from Wall Street. The fund-raiser, to be held at ABC Kitchen, will run $35,800 a plate, Bloomberg News reports.
snippet: Never mind all that talk of “fat cat bankers.” President Obama will head to New York on March 1 to raise campaign cash from Wall Street. The fund-raiser, to be held at ABC Kitchen, will run $35,800 a plate, Bloomberg News reports.
lead_paragraph: Never mind all that talk of “fat cat bankers.” President Obama will head to New York on March 1 to raise campaign cash from Wall Street. The fund-raiser, to be held at ABC Kitchen, will run $35,800 a plate, Bloomberg News reported. Robert Wolf, chairman of UBS Americas, and Marc Lasry, founder of the Avenue Capital Group, are among the event’s sponsors. Read more »

headline.main: Obama Seeks Dinner and Dollars From Wall Street
